title: Economic collapse leave Gazans with hard choices
text:
Economic collapse leave Gazans with hard choices Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 01:51 
Gaza's economy is in crisis and many are wondering what impact growing poverty will have on the political situation there. As Sonia Legg reports, even those who can make a living are running at a fraction of their capacity because of Israeli restrictions and blockades.
